ygData.subject: RE: Equipment?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I am going to start with my equipment.  I am level 27 almost had 28 last night but died right before I was going to ding.  I consider my stuff to be very
ygData.messageBody:
Well I am going to start with my equipment. I am level 27 almost had 28
last night but died right before I was going to ding. I consider my stuff
to be very low end compared to everyone else.

Arm= Bronze bracer
Arm= Ivory bracelet, gives some mana and something else
Back= Lizzy cloak +5 dex
Chest= Dwarven Ring mail tunic. its got a whole bunch of resist on it
Ear= +2 agil earringsx2
Face= I think its a iron mask. Its some standard armor
Feet= Bronze boots
Finger= +2 wisx2
hands= snake skin gloves
Legs= Banded armor
Neck= Spiked collar
Shoulder= I forget :P I think banded
Waist= Cheap belt :P
Primary weapon= Cold Iron Morning star
Shield=Shiny brass shield


I know what you people are saying that I should camp for items but that
takes all the fun out of it. When you have to camp weeks to get 1 item.
BAH!!!

Qanin Skywanderer
27th Cleric The Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Riley [mailto:criley@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 18, 1999 12:33 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Equipment?


From: Chris Riley <criley@...>

>Well, I consider myself to be under equipped for my level (getting harder
to
>say that now that I have some purple stuff) as I have had a few items for
>almost 30 levels now. Anyway I'll give you a run down on the items I wear.


How about posting a list of what you were wearing at the milestones (lvl
10, lvl 20, etc) That way we could see what we should be looking for when
we reach those levels.
